phaser_wrapper

  • 3 phaser games:
    1. 8-ball-pool-coffee, which is a coffeescript rewrite of the guided project from the Interphase book.
    2. snood-pinball-coffee is a pinball game
    3. snood-pinball-mightyeditor is an early iteration of the pinball game, made with the MightyEditor GUI.

gosu_wrapper_snake_example

  • barebones desktop game game built with ruby and my gosu_wrapper boiler

snake

  • html5 game

asteroids

  • html game with canvas
